title: His One and Only: 50 Loving States, Alabama
description: Fifteen years ago, Josie Witherspoon vowed to leave Alabama and never, ever think of Beau Prescott, the rich high school quarterback who broke her heart, again. Well...Life didn't quite work out that way. One terrible failed marriage later, and she's right back in Alabama, now working as a housekeeper for Beau Prescott after the pro quarterback is injured in a life-altering accident.The plan is to keep her head down, do her job, and collect her paycheck. But then Beau has to go and make her a rather indecent proposal...Two damaged people ... one blazing love story.The sixth standalone interracial romance in the 50 Loving States series, only One-Click if you like your forever love smoking hot!
author: Theodora Taylor
